President Satya Nadella to president of Microsoft's Server and Tools Business. "We're already making strong traction across our Server and Tools Business by embracing cloud services," said Microsoft Chief Executive Officer Steve Ballmer . Satya Nadella has deep experience in both our server business and online services, which will help accelerate our momentum while setting the course to deliver the cloud computing scenarios of the future. As president of the Server and Tools Business, Satya Nadella will oversee the overall strategy, engineering, marketing and product development for Microsoft's server, tools and cloud platform efforts. There's this worry about the optics of all that. I understand that- voters don't want to be threatened, and voters shouldn't be threatened, Bill Lockyer said. "However, you also have to be honest with them about what the consequences will be if the only policy option is an all-cut budget. And no one has yet produced that."
